description: The services of a Bridge Engineering Consultant were required to undertake the full scope of work associated with replacing the movable transfer bridge at the Souris Ferry Terminal. Work included planning, conceptual design, design development, detailed design, and preparation of construction documents, technical assistance during tender and post tender period, construction and contract administration services, resident site inspection services during the construction and warranty period, inspection and commissioning services, and post-construction services. The new Souris Movable Transfer Bridge shall satisfy the User Department requirements and meet current Canadian Highway Bridge Design Code (CHBDC) standards and CSA S826 Ferry Boarding Facilities and other relevant standards. The design and construction of the new transfer bridge must be conducted in an efficient, expedient and economical manner.

**Title (English & French):**
- **title-titre-eng:** Souris Movable Transfer Bridge Replacement
- **title-titre-fra:** Remplacement du pont de transfert mobile à Souris

**Reference Number:** PW-_PWA-323-6271

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Solicitation Number:** EB144-230944/A

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-03 13:00:00

---

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Transport Canada (TC) invites interested parties to submit a proposal for the replacement of the movable transfer bridge at the Souris Ferry Terminal.

**Project Requirements:**
The proposed services involve the provision of a multidiscipline engineering team for the design, development, and implementation of a new movable transfer bridge that meets the current Canadian Highway Bridge Design Code (CHBDC) standards and relevant Canadian standards.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope includes planning, site inspection, conceptual design, detailed design, preparation of construction documents, technical assistance during tender, construction, and contract administration services. Additionally, the contract will include inspection, commissioning, and post-construction services.

**Requirements:**
The successful proponent will provide a full consulting team with expertise in the design of moveable bridges, including structural/marine engineering, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, geotechnical engineering, hydraulics specialist, controls specialist, commissioning specialist, and surveying as required.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender allows for the following trade agreements:
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Delivery Location:**
The delivery location for this project is Prince Edward Island (Île-du-Prince-Édouard).
